org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.ui

Interface ControlPanelEventsListener


  • public interface ControlPanelEventsListener
    The interface to be implemented in order to receive DeviceControlPanel relevant events

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void errorOccurred(DeviceControlPanel panel, java.lang.String reason)
      Notify the interface implementer about an error in the DeviceControlPanel activities
      void metadataChanged(DeviceControlPanel panel, UIElement uielement)
      Notify the interface implementer about the metadata changed in the UIElement
      void notificationActionDismiss(DeviceControlPanel panel)
      Dismiss the NotificationAction of the given DeviceControlPanel
      void valueChanged(DeviceControlPanel panel, UIElement uielement, java.lang.Object newValue)
      Notify the interface implementer about the changed value in the UIElement

    • Method Detail

      • valueChanged

        void valueChanged(DeviceControlPanel panel,
                UIElement uielement,
                java.lang.Object newValue)
        Notify the interface implementer about the changed value in the UIElement
        Parameters:
        panel - DeviceControlPanel where the value has changed
        uielement - The UIElement where the change has occurred
        newValue - The new value

      • metadataChanged

        void metadataChanged(DeviceControlPanel panel,
                   UIElement uielement)
        Notify the interface implementer about the metadata changed in the UIElement
        Parameters:
        panel - DeviceControlPanel where the metadata has changed
        uielement - The UIElement where the change has occurred

      • notificationActionDismiss

        void notificationActionDismiss(DeviceControlPanel panel)
        Dismiss the NotificationAction of the given DeviceControlPanel
        Parameters:
        panel - The NotificationAction control panel to dismissed

      • errorOccurred

        void errorOccurred(DeviceControlPanel panel,
                 java.lang.String reason)
        Notify the interface implementer about an error in the DeviceControlPanel activities
        Parameters:
        panel - DeviceControlPanel where the error has occurred
        reason - The error reason
